mapper.update: update sys_order_divide set deleteStatus = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select d.id, d.createTime, d.deleteStatus, d.emp_no, d.order_no, d.order_price, d.`type`, d.money, d.clean_time, d.operator_no, d.divide_no, e.`name` emp_name, e.position_id, m.`name` operator_name, o.start, o.`end`, o.endTime from sys_order_divide d left JOIN sys_employee e on e.emp_no=d.emp_no LEFT JOIN sys_employee m on d.operator_no=m.emp_no left join sys_order o on d.order_no=o.order_no where d.deleteStatus = 0 and d.name=#{name} and e.position_id=#{position_id} and d.order_no=#{order_no} and d.clean_time >= #{startTime} and d.clean_time <= #{endTime}
